snippet: The idea behind the transaction – the biggest ever by iQor – is to combine the company’s own customer support capabilities and the Jabil business’s services for electronics makers, retailers and services.
abstract: The idea behind the transaction – the biggest ever by iQor – is to combine the company’s own customer support capabilities and the Jabil business’s services for electronics makers, retailers and services.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: IQor to Buy Jabil's Aftermarket Services Unit for $725 Million
